title: 2 of 3 terrorists declared killed in Pulwama encounter, managed to flee
article_body: NEW DELHI: Only one of the three terrorists trapped in the at on Friday was killed by the security forces, while the other two managed to escape. police chief told TOI that while there was confirmed information that three Lashker e Toiba terrorists were holed up in the building when the encounter broke out, only one body — of a local belonging to Handwara — was found during the post-operation searches at the site. Intelligence sources said it was still being ascertained if the two terrorists managed to escape right at the beginning of the encounter or midway through the firing. “There wasn’t too much of disturbance from the locals, a regular phenomenon during encounters in the Valley, on Friday. So it is possible that they may have escaped at the beginning itself. It is being investigated how they managed to flee despite the security cordon,” said an officer. A teenager was killed during the encounter and eight civilians injured. The dead terrorist has been identified as Sajad Ahmad Shah, a resident of Gund, Chogul district of Handwara.
